title: $795 - 2 Bed / 1 Bath Duplex with Pest Included and Pet-Friendly
posting_body: to schedule a tour or any questions.
Phlox Duplexes is a quiet property located minutes from Downtown, U of H, Medical Center, I 45 South, and Hobby Airport.
We have availability on newly renovated 2 BED/1 BATH Duplexes with fresh paint, upgraded kitchen, and bath.

Thoughtfully designed with comfort in mind, our floor plans feature a wide array of stylishly efficient amenities including an open kitchen, electric stove, refrigerator, pantry, tile flooring, ceiling fans, mini blinds, window A/C, and more.
We bring you classic house living at its best.
